title: Save Mayrina
content:
the room.

You'll end up back outside in the southwestern part of Putrid Bog at (X:-72, Y:210). You'll find Mayrina here crying by her husband's coffin. Speak to her to get the following choices:

I found a wand - I think I can resurrect your husband. Are you alright? You could just leave him here. Whining won't get you there any faster. Stand with her in silence. Leave her to mourn.
